channel.title: CVE Feed for Dahua -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dahua -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-3121|2024-08-02T06:48:07.341Z -- dahua -- smart%20parking%20management
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in Dahua Smart Parking Management up to 20230528 and classified as problematic. This vulnerability affects unknown code of the file /ipms/imageConvert/image. The manipulation of the argument fileUrl leads to server-side request forgery. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-230800. NOTE: The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way. In Dahua Smart Parking Management bis 20230528 wurde eine problematische Schwachstelle gefunden. Es geht um eine nicht näher bekannte Funktion der Datei /ipms/imageConvert/image. Durch das Beeinflussen des Arguments fileUrl mit unbekannten Daten kann eine server-side request forgery-Schwachstelle ausgenutzt werden. Der Exploit steht zur öffentlichen Verfügung.

item.title: CVE-2023-3836|2024-08-02T07:08:50.600Z -- dahua -- smart%20park%20management
item.description: A vulnerability classified as critical was found in Dahua Smart Park Management up to 20230713. This vulnerability affects unknown code of the file /emap/devicePoint_addImgIco?hasSubsystem=true. The manipulation of the argument upload leads to unrestricted upload. The attack can be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. VDB-235162 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability. NOTE: The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way. In Dahua Smart Park Management bis 20230713 wurde eine Schwachstelle entdeckt. Sie wurde als kritisch eingestuft. Betroffen ist eine unbekannte Verarbeitung der Datei /emap/devicePoint_addImgIco?hasSubsystem=true. Durch Manipulation des Arguments upload mit unbekannten Daten kann eine unrestricted upload-Schwachstelle ausgenutzt werden. Der Angriff kann über das Netzwerk passieren. Der Exploit steht zur öffentlichen Verfügung.

item.title: CVE-2024-39944|2024-07-31T19:10:56.884Z -- dahua -- ipc-hx8xxx%20and%20nvr4xxx
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in Dahua products.Attackers can send carefully crafted data packets to the interface with vulnerabilities, causing the device to crash.

item.title: CVE-2024-39950|2024-07-31T19:12:46.084Z -- dahua -- nvr4xxx%20and%20ipc-hx8xxx
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in Dahua products. Attackers can send carefully crafted data packets to the interface with vulnerabilities to initiate device initialization.

item.title: CVE-2024-39945|2024-07-31T14:01:32.146Z -- dahua -- nvr4xxx
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in Dahua products. After obtaining the administrator's username and password, the attacker can send a carefully crafted data packet to the interface with vulnerabilities, causing the device to crash.

item.title: CVE-2024-39947|2024-07-31T03:25:09.750Z -- dahua -- nvr4xxx
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in Dahua products.After obtaining the ordinary user's username and password, the attacker can send a carefully crafted data packet to the interface with vulnerabilities, causing the device to crash.
